Subskills.name: Mad Rampage
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by madness control.

Subskills.name: Ground Zero
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of madness control.

Subskills.name: Surging Madness
Subskills.description: After hooking monsters in knock them back with intense force dealing increased damage stunning them.

Subskills.name: Powerful Chainstrike
Subskills.description: Inflicts stun with increased duration on hit.

Subskills.name: Arena Police
Subskills.description: Decreases the cooldown of madness control.

Subskills.name: We Are All Mad Here
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of hooked targets with madness control.

Subskills.name: Napalm Charge
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict burning on hit.

Subskills.name: Boom Boom BOOM
Subskills.description: Chance to rain down additional bombs at targets on hit.

Subskills.name: Blink and you are dead
Subskills.description: Teleport a short distance unleashing madness control at the initial location.

Subskills.name: Capture and Punish
Subskills.description: Chance to deal increased damage inflicting slow on hit.

Subskills.name: Effective Control
Subskills.description: Increases the hooking speed of madness control.

Subskills.name: Keep Sane among Mad
Subskills.description: Decreases movement diminish when using madness control.

Subskills.name: Area Control
Subskills.description: Madness control can be casted at target location with increased area of effect radius.

Subskills.name: Evasive Move
Subskills.description: Become immortal for a short duration.
